So lt Seems
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Poetry: So lt Seems
By King952 on Thursday, July 15, 2004 - 07:28 am:

We're born;
We live;
We die;
Or so it seems...

So it seems,
Time will pass,
And children get older,
I'll get older too.

So it seems,
In my dreams,
I'm getting bolder,
Falling in love with you.

So it seems,
The world will end.
I'd rather get older,
Falling in love with you.

-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_

Not my best works, but Read, Rate, Enjoy...

By Kalus on Friday, July 16, 2004 - 08:37 am:

By Icelord13 on Sunday, July 18, 2004 - 08:59 am:

It's all right for a freeverse poem. Everything seems to be kept in a rather readable amount of beats per line. The last line may be about 1 beat off, but other than that it's a pretty good piece.
